DOC.brief_title: Intrapartum Glucose Management Among Women With Gestational Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: Research objective- To compare `` Tight '' vs. `` Less Tight '' intrapartum glucose management Hypothesis : Neonates bear mother manage via `` Less Tight '' intrapartum glucose management protocol lower mean glucose level first 24 hour life compare mean glucose level among infant bear mother manage via `` Tight '' intrapartum glucose management protocol . Study Design : Randomized trial Population : English Spanish speak woman diagnosis GDM manage Diabetes Pregnancy Program Women & Infants Hospital , plan deliver Women & Infants Hospital Once enrol , patient randomize `` Tight '' `` Less Tight '' intrapartum glucose control . Once admitted labor floor intrapartum management appropriate power plan glucose control initiate . The specific labor management leave discretion provider .
